data.title: LADDER - Learning Algorithm for Deep Distance Estimation and Reconstruction
data.name: LADDER

evidence: "This repository contains code supplementing the paper LADDER - Revisiting the Cosmic Distance Ladder with Deep Learning Approaches and Exploring its Applications"
Usage instructions show running as a script: "python3 main.py --pairs [number] --output [directory name]" and describe it as "Main script, runs everything else."

Files list indicates a standalone research codebase (dataset loading, training, inference, model) used to perform the cosmological analysis: "dataset.py -> Loads dataset and implements sampling routine.", "train.py -> Train/test loops.", "inference.py -> Inference algorithm implementation." and distribution is via the GitHub repo with no mention of package managers or binaries.
